Package org.sgrewritten.stargate.database

Class SQLDatabase

java.lang.Object
org.sgrewritten.stargate.database.SQLDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageAPI
public class SQLDatabase extends Object implements StorageAPI
A generic SQL database used for loading and saving portal data

      Specified by:
      createNetwork in interface StorageAPI
      Parameters:

      type -

      The type of network to look for.

      storageType -

      Returns:

      Throws:
      InvalidNameException -

      If the given network name is invalid

      NameLengthException -

      If a name is too long or short

      UnimplementedFlagException -

      If a selected flag is unimplemented
